response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to both of us. This exceptional item is worth $1,500,000 to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. To make this transaction beneficial for all parties involved, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your satisfaction. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
